description: The so-called Dema wall was a built fortification of ancient Attica that was intended to a close a gap between between Aigaleos and Parnes. The wall's course originally ran more than 4 km.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: near Dema

properties.title: OSM location of The Dema Wall
